## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:**	[Vitvi15g04324](https://ensembl.gramene.org/id/Vitvi15g04324)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>P450 CYP78A5</u>
- **Gene Name:** P450 CYP78A5 
- **Genome:** [Vitis vinifera PN40024.v4](https://ensembl.gramene.org/Vitis_vinifera/Info/Index)
- **Species:** *Vitis vinifera*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - Specific candidate transcription factors that are known to regulate ovule and floral meristem development while simultaneously harboring CArG (CC[A/T]6/8GG) motifs in their promoters, such as **P450 CYP78A5**, DELLA1, WUSCHEL, and INO.
   - KLUH encodes the cytochrome **P450 CYP78A5**, and kluh mutants produce small seeds, suggesting that CYP78A5 regulates seed size.
